All Classes

Class Description
AllTests  
Card
Representation of a single playing card.
CardTest
CardTest will test the following: isSameAs method can check whether two cards are identical.
CheckWinner
Class with static methods to check if player is a winner.
ComputerInput
Class with static methods to handle computer players' actions.
Deck
Represents a deck of playing cards.
DeckTest
DeckTest will test the following: able to add a card to the deck by calling addCard method.
GameApp
Main class to run and control the Estimation game.
GameController
Specification of the controller of an Estimation game.
GameModel
Specification of the model of an Estimation game.
GameModelTest
GameModelTest will test the following : the number of tricks will be updated the dealer will be rotated in a clock-wise manner the winningPlayer can be set and retrieved the total number of tricks for a specific round will be increased, decreased and retrieved the number of rounds will be updated
GameView
Specification of the user interface of an Estimation game.
Hand
Represents the basic functionality of a hand of cards.
HandTest
HandTest will test the following : cards will be able to be add to hand object able to remove a card from a hand by both index and the card itself.
HumanInput
Class with static methods to handle the human player's actions.
IllegalMoveException
Checked exception class that is thrown when player makes an illegal move.
Player
Represents the basic functionality of a Player.
PlayerTest
PlayerTest able to set and check a playerâ€™s type (human/computer) able to calculate the playerâ€™s score according to his bid after one round able to update and check a playerâ€™s total number of tricks he has won.
Rank
Specification of the rank values for a standard deck of cards.
RankTest
RankTest able to perform rank comparison accurately.
Suit
Specification of the suit values for a standard deck of cards.
SuitTest
SuitTest able to perform suit comparison after the trump suit has been set.
TestRunner
TestRunner will run all the test cases and output the success and failure message.
